name: C++ Programming Language
description: In this course, You will learn about variables, arrays, functions, recursion, structure, pointer, union, file, objects of C++ language.

name: JavaScript
description: In this course, You will learn about variables, arrays, class, object, destructuring, normal function, arrow function and es6 features of javaScript.

name: Python
description: In this course, You will learn about variables, classes and objects, constructor, inheritance, polymorphism, encapsulation, decorator and closure of python language.

name: Maths
description: In this course, You will learn about linear algebra, calculus and analysis, geometry and topology, logic, numeric theory and combinatorics.
